knimeNode.name: Random Numbers Generator
knimeNode.shortDescription: A node to generate a table with a single column of random numbers

fullDescription.intro:
A column of random numbers in either Double of Integer format is created according to the settings described.
This node was developed by Vernalis (Cambridge, UK). For feedback and more information, please contact knime@vernalis.com
fullDescription.option: The name of the column in the output table containing the random numbers
Double or Integer values are created
The range in which the numbers are included - min and max values are inclusive

The number of values to be created. Note that if the unique values option is selected for integers then this will be overridden by the maximum possible number of values between min and max, if the value here is bigger than (max-min+1)
Create a list of unique values

ports.outPort: Port containing a single column of random numbers.
